comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This photo was printed in the New-York tribune., February 09, 1916, Page 5.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Mlle. Dazie: Daisy Ann Peterkin (1884-1952) (travsd.wordpress.com/2013/09/16/stars-of-vaudeville-805-m...) In Goodwin's weekly : a thinking paper for thinking people., September 28, 1918, Image 1, Mlle. Dazie was described as one of America's greatest dancers. An article about Mlle. Dazie's toe dancing is in the New-York tribune., June 01, 1919, Page 10, col. 7. See also broadway.cas.sc.edu/content/mlle-dazie www.imdb.com/name/nm0206807/

comment._content: B-59 and artolog: Thanks for the further information and helpful links concerning Mlle. Dazie and her unique footwear! We will expand the catalog record when we update.
